name: breaking 💥
description: Changes that introduce a breaking change.

name: build 🔧
description: Changes that effect how the build system works.

name: dependencies
description: Pull requests that update a dependency file

name: duplicate 2️⃣
description: The issue or pull request already exists.

name: feature ✨
description: This change introduces a new feature.

name: proposal 🔮
description: Pattern or feature proposal that needs discussion.

name: test 🧪
description: Changes introduce new tests to the project or update existing ones.

name: triage ⚠️
description: This issue or pull request requires triage.

name: wontfix 🔨
description: This will not be worked on.

name: style 🎀
description: Changes that do not affect the meaning of the code (white-space, formatting, missing semi-colons, etc).

name: refactor 🛠
description: A code change that neither fixes a bug nor adds a feature.
